title: Mystery Gifting
body:
Yes I know there is a risk obviously when taking Mystery Gifting, And yes it is Gambling, and yes you can call me dumb for doing it, but why not make it more of a system where it gives you a higher chance of receiving skins for a champ you don't have a skin on, since this is coming off the back of obviously receiving skins for champs that i already have better ones on E.g Kennen M.D when I own Arctic Ops and Dreanknight Nas when I have infernal. Imho I see this as a healtheir way to do it so you can do it knowing your more likely to receive that skin for donger, than another nasus skin you wont use.

wanna see what other peoples opinion on it is
Cheers

replies.body: that removes like half the fun of it. and what if you get a better skin than the one you already own.
Not like remove the chance of getting a skin for a champ you already own, but 4/4 this weekend was a bit rough
